title: Service Areas | RWF Home Improvements | Fayetteville, Sanford, Lillington
description: Explore RWF Home Improvements' service areas, including Fayetteville, Sanford, Lillington, and surrounding NC communities. We specialize in fencing, decks, windows, and doors.
introTitle: Proudly Serving Fayetteville, Sanford, Lillington, and Surrounding North Carolina Communities.
introText: From Anderson Creek to Pinehurst and everywhere in between, RWF Home Improvements brings quality craftsmanship and reliable service to homeowners across the region. With over 35 years of experience, we understand the unique needs of North Carolina properties, ensuring every project—whether it's fencing, decking, or windows—is built to last in our local climate. Our dedicated team is committed to making your home improvement vision a reality, providing personalized solutions and exceptional results no matter where you are located within our service area.

reviews.name: LaSarah Richardson
reviews.review: It has officially been a year since RWF installed my fence and concrete. Everything is still standing strong with no issues. Richard and Hayley were patient and answered all my questions. Financing was a breeze, and I recommend them to everyone
reviews.title: Outstanding Service

reviews.name: Annette Lewis
reviews.review: The team at RWF was fantastic! They installed my privacy fence within a day and left no mess behind. Hayley was incredibly thoughtful and made sure I understood everything. I love the way they designed the gate—such great quality
reviews.title: Quick and Professional

reviews.name: Crystal Sutton
reviews.review: As a REALTOR, I deal with many contractors, and RWF stood out for their quick responses and excellent communication. They installed a beautiful privacy fence quickly and at the best price. I’m incredibly impressed with their professionalism.
reviews.title: Top-Notch Communication
